markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I pay for my GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675961653913-How-do-I-pay-for-my-GLoan-Sakto)
- [Am I qualified for GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675903982361-Am-I-qualified-for-GLoan-Sakto)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

GLoan Sakto is a **pre-qualified entry loan solution where you can loan PHP 100 - PHP 300 instantly** via your GCash app. If eligible, you will receive an SMS from GCash.

GLoan offers and approvals are subject to evaluation and are not guaranteed.

Learn more about GLoan Sakto below:

- Short payment term (payable after **14 days**)
- Minimal fees and **0% interest**
- May be used to purchase from over 200,000 partner merchants
- May be cashed out

**Note**: GLoan Sakto is a **pre-qualified loan.** If eligible, you will receive an SMS from GCash. GLoan offers and approvals are subject to evaluation and are not guaranteed.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [Am I eligible for GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675903982361)
- [What is the difference between GLoan and GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675860785177)
- [How do I pay for my GLoan Sakto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40675961653913)
